title: Lavender Moon
description: Luna is ready to live her life on her own terms. Even if it means working at the local scent club, Lavender Moon. She’s tired of not getting what she wants, which includes her older, powerful stepbrother and his pack. It’s time for her to take life into her own hands, but only time will tell if she gets what she wants or what she needs. If she’s a really good girl, she just might get both.This is a standalone, why choose, omegaverse romance.
author: Sarah   Blue
